about_the_game:
Overview:
Embark on an epic journey in "The Last Windmill", a captivating action-adventure game that immerses you in a world on the brink of destruction. As a valiant knight, your mission is to defend the last remaining windmill against hordes of relentless monsters. Prepare for intense battles, strategic decision-making, and heart-pounding moments as you fight for survival.

Key Features:
  • Defend the Windmill: Take on the role of a courageous knight entrusted with protecting the last standing windmill. Use your skills, weapons, and barricades to hold off waves of ferocious monsters.

  • Action-Packed Combat: Engage in thrilling combat encounters with a variety of enemy types. Unleash powerful bow mastery and use special abilities.

  • Upgrade: Earn resources to enhance your knight's abilities, upgrade your base, and acquire powerful equipment. Tailor your playstyle to match your preferences and tackle challenges with your unique approach.

  • Dynamic Progression: Face increasingly challenging waves of enemies as you progress through the game. Adapt your strategies, unlock new abilities, and become a formidable force to reckon with.

Prepare yourself for an unforgettable adventure in "The Last Windmill" as you fight against overwhelming odds and strive to become the hero that saves the day. Are you ready to take a stand and protect what's left of humanity?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2012 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2012 or later

name: The Last Windmill

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic journey in The Last Windmill an action-adventure game where you defend the last standing windmill against relentless hordes of monsters. Engage in intense battles, face increasingly challenging waves of enemies. Become the hero that saves humanity in this thrilling fight.
